page.title: ServerlessDays ANZ - William Liebenberg
page.description: William is a Solution Architect at SSW with a strong focus on building enterprise solutions on Azure and enjoys developing great software engineering practices for teams. /n/n/n William is an active member of the Melbourne developer community where you can find him attending or presenting at user groups, hack days and conferences every time he has a chance! Also, William is president of Melbourne .NET user group as well as co-organiser of the Melb.NET user group (yes, there are 2 .NET meetups in town – naming is hard!). /n/n/n Recently in his spare time William combined his passion for Serverless IoT and BBQing to build his own smoker that can track the temperature and doneness of his tasty treats.

organiser.name: William Liebenberg
